thread.title: Belgium passenger train derails and falls down embankment leaving a number of people seriously injured
thread.title_full: Belgium passenger train derails and falls down embankment leaving a number of people seriously injured

author: Anthony Bond
title: Belgium passenger train derails and falls down embankment leaving a number of people seriously injured
text:
Belgium passenger train derails and falls down embankment leaving a number of people seriously injured The train was left on its side trapped down an embankment after the incident near Leuven Share Get daily     
A passenger train has derailed in Belgium leaving a large number of people injured. 
The train was left on its side trapped down an embankment after the incident near Leuven. 
Emergency service officials say about 20 people have been injured. It is not yet known how seriously although there are reports of at least one fatality. 
Local media report the train was on its way to De Panne and had just left the station in Leuven. 
Pictures from the scene show the train derailed and a wagon lying beside the track. 
A large emergency service presence is now at the scene. 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
